name: kitchen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 a room where food is kept, prepared, and cooked and where the dishes are washed: We usually eat breakfast in the kitchen. the kitchen table a new fitted kitchen (= cupboards that look the same attached to the walls and floor in the kitchen)
Daly and Newton/OJO Images/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe delicious smell of freshly-made coffee came from the kitchen."Would you mind tidying up the kitchen?" "I already have done."Our washing machine broke down yesterday and flooded the kitchen.He was busy peeling apples in the kitchen.There's plenty of cupboard space in the kitchen for all your pots and pans.
